Meta-Twitter Friends Global Summit 1

Hello River

"Tweeps Meet"

London Heathrow area

Friday 17th April (4pm) - Monday 20th April 2020 (12 noon)


A weekend cabin retreat to hang out with Twitter friends IRL.

This a private invite to join, please do not share this page.

Venue

A youth hostel building in the countryside, hired for our group's exclusive use

18 bunks, 4 bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen, diner/lounge, 2 bathrooms & outside space

30mins by train from Central London / 20 mins by car from London Heathrow airport

For a full overview of the venue with plenty of pictures click this link:

YHA Jordans youth hostel

Full address:


Welders Lane
Jordans
Beaconsfield
HP9 2SN

Travel

Jessica will drive from London to the venue on Friday 17th at 3pm and return Monday at 12 noon, there are 3 car spaces for whoever wants them.

Let Jessica know when your flight arrives and she can pick up from Heathrow

Nearest train station: Seer Green and Jordans

Let Jessica know when you're train arrives to be picked up from the village station

Click this link for driving directions

Important

Bed linded is provided, but not towels, please bring a towel

The cabin feels isolated but you can leave at any time:

  • The organiser has a car and can drive you around
  • the local village has a direct rail link to London Marylebone
  • London Heathrow is a 20 minute drive away (by organiser car or taxi)

Activities

Cooking, chatting, smoking, being silly

Plus suggestions:

Sentience Intelligence Agency
Bad singing Card games How to run a summit
Bonfire Bonfire Bonfire

Playing instruments
Wiggly dancing
Alexander Technique
